name: Pick the Star by spotlessmind1975
description:
"PICK THE STAR (10 liner)" is a multitasking arcade game for one player. The player must pick mostly the stars that descend from the top of the screen using the joystick. This game runs on four different 8-bit home computers: ATARI 400/800, ATARI XL/XE, Commodore 64 and Amstrad CPC 664. I'd like to participate with this program in the 2023 edition of the Contest, in the category "EXTREME-256". This is the file where there is a proof that the game belongs to the above category: The various binary files with the program can be downloaded from this link: https://spotlessmind1975.itch.io/pick-the-star-10-liner 

 Here I published "step-by-step" instructions on how to load, list and launch the program on the various emulators, and how to play it: https://github.com/spotlessmind1975/pick-the-star-10liner/blob/main/docs/instruc... 

 A detailed explanation of the source code is available here: https://github.com/spotlessmind1975/pick-the-star-10liner/blob/main/docs/source.... 

 The official repository of the project is here: https://github.com/spotlessmind1975/pick-the-star-10liner
